original_title: The Private Life of a Masterpiece  - Katsushika Hokusai: The Great Wave
overview: Created as "disposable art" circa 1830, the woodblock print of "The Great Wave" by 70-year-old Katsushika Hokusai has earned acclaim and a place of honor in the art world. Scholars and critics discuss the work's creation and wide influence.
title: The Private Life of a Masterpiece  - Katsushika Hokusai: The Great Wave
